alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 23 at 2:35PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected through Sunday evening. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible Monday and Tuesday. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Keya Paha, Brown, Rock and Blaine Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
